Enum MappedFile.OpenMode

open file mode

Namespace: pdftron.Filters
Assembly: PDFNetAndroid.dll
Syntax
public enum OpenMode : int

Fields

Name Description
e_append_mode

Opens for reading and appending. Creates the file first if it doesn't exist.
e_read_mode

Opens file for reading. An exception is thrown if the file doesn't exist.
e_write_mode

Opens an empty file for writing. If the given file exists, its contents are destroyed.
